mapper.select: SELECT A.RNUM , A.NUM , A.CATEGORY , A.WRITER , A.SUBJECT , A.CONTENT , A.REG_DATE , A.UPD_DATE , A.ADP_YN , A.DEL_YN , A.PARENT_NUM FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS RNUM , QB.NUM , QB.CATEGORY , QB.WRITER , QB.SUBJECT , QB.CONTENT , QB.REG_DATE , QB.UPD_DATE , QB.ADP_YN , QB.DEL_YN , QB.PARENT_NUM FROM QA_BOARD QB , (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) R WHERE 1=1 AND 'RNUM' <= 1 * 10 AND QB.NUM > 0 GROUP BY QB.NUM ) AS A LIMIT #{pageCnt}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qa_board ( NUM ,CATEGORY ,WRITER ,SUBJECT ,CONTENT ,REG_DATE ,ADP_YN ,DEL_YN ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(num), 0) + 1 FROM qa_board ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY) , #{category} , #{writer} , #{subject} , #{content} , (SELECT date_format(now(),'%Y-%c-%d')) , 'N' , 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT NUM ,CATEGORY ,WRITER ,SUBJECT ,CONTENT ,REG_DATE ,UPD_DATE ,ADP_YN ,DEL_YN ,PARENT_NUM FROM qa_board WHERE NUM=#{num}
